author: Unreal Engine
description:
The web is evolving beyond static 2D sites into interconnected, immersive, real-time 3D worlds. 

With Xsolla Metasites, Unreal Engine creators can instantly stream their projects—whether prototypes, gameplay demos, simulations, visualizations, or artistic expressions—directly to any browser and device, no downloads required. 

This session recorded at Unreal Fest Stockholm reveals the architecture powering massive-scale, cloud-streamed multiplayer and the Metabrowser plugin that makes publishing as simple as uploading a build. 

Beyond the tech, discover how Metasites enables you to share playable experiences, grow communities, connect worlds through portals, and unlock new opportunities for engagement and monetization—marking the next step in the evolution of the 3D web.

Learn more about Unreal Engine here: unrealengine.com

#XsollaMetasites, #3DWorlds, #CloudStreaming, #MetabrowserPlugin, #3DWeb, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #UnrealFestStockholm
title: Play in 3D with Cloud Play; Share with Friends via Xsolla Metasites | Unreal Fest Stockholm 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this session recorded at Unreal Fest Stockholm and learn about the tools at your disposal to address an increasingly relevant issue for game developers: how to ensure younger players’ safety. 

While the focus of game developers is on building the best games they can, keeping younger audiences safe playing them can be something that is both challenging and expensive to implement. 

In this session, KWS walk through how an implementation with their free Parent Verification tool can ensure age appropriate experiences for all young gamers.

Learn more about KWS here: kidswebservices.com

#GameDevelopment, #ParentVerification, #KidsWebServices, #KWS, #UnrealFestStockholm
title: Keeping Your Young Players Safe with KWS’ Parent Verification Service | Unreal Fest Stockholm 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Control Rig can replicate most "classical" rigging approaches of the type used in Autodesk Maya or other animation software. But it can do much more.  

In this talk recorded at Unreal Fest Stockholm, we focus on how Control Rigs can become smart, relying on the real-time functionality within Unreal Engine to empower animators to work faster and more efficiently. 

We take a look at how to blur the lines between runtime functionality for a game and animation authoring functionality when animating in Sequencer.  

The session will challenge your established approaches and help you to use Unreal Engine to its full potential for animation authoring.

Watch to take a leap from 25-year-old animation approaches to a novel real-time environment framework. 

Learn more about Unreal Engine here: unrealengine.com

#Animation, #ControlRig, #Sequencer, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #UnrealFestStockholm
title: How to Make Control Rigs Smart | Unreal Fest Stockholm 2025
